feature_description: Zerith-var lobs a flaming skull at an enemy, dealing Flame Damage. Grants a corpse on use.
Zerith-var summons a flaming skeleton that charges at the enemy and explodes, dealing Flame Damage in an area.
Zerith-var creates a field of bones that deals Magic Damage over time to enemies and generates corpses.
Zerith-var summons a skeletal mage that attacks enemies with elemental bolts for a duration.
Zerith-var summons a massive frost atronach that smashes enemies three times, applying Major Vulnerability.
Zerith-var slashes enemies in front with a scythe of dark energy, dealing Magic Damage and healing based on enemies hit.
Zerith-var wraps themselves in protective bone, granting Major Resolve and returning damage to melee attackers.
Zerith-var siphons energy from nearby corpses, healing themselves and generating Ultimate.
Zerith-var summons a totem of bone that fears nearby enemies and grants Minor Protection to allies.
Zerith-var transforms into a powerful Bone Goliath, gaining increased Health and access to devastating attacks.
Zerith-var knits flesh together to heal an ally, but applies Minor Defile to the target briefly.
Zerith-var cleanses negative effects from themselves and nearby allies, removing up to 2 negative effects.
Zerith-var consumes a corpse to heal themselves and nearby allies over time.
Zerith-var summons a ghostly spirit that heals the companion and transfers a portion of damage taken to itself.
Zerith-var revives fallen allies using necromantic power, bringing them back with partial health.
Tanlorin breathes fire at enemies in a cone, dealing Flame Damage and applying burning.
Tanlorin slashes an enemy with a flaming weapon, dealing immediate Flame Damage and additional damage over time.
Tanlorin launches a fiery chain to pull an enemy to them, dealing Flame Damage and taunting.
Tanlorin engulfs themselves in flames, dealing Flame Damage to nearby enemies over time.
Tanlorin plants a battle standard that deals Flame Damage to enemies and applies Major Defile.
Tanlorin wraps themselves in protective scales, gaining Major Resolve and returning damage to melee attackers.
Tanlorin summons talons from the ground to immobilize enemies and deal Magic Damage over time.
Tanlorin draws on draconic power to heal themselves and gain Health Recovery.
Tanlorin surrounds themselves with draconic scales that reflect projectiles back at attackers.
Tanlorin leaps through the air and crashes down, dealing Physical Damage and knocking back enemies.
Tanlorin hurls a chunk of rock at an enemy, dealing Physical Damage and stunning them briefly.
Tanlorin charges weapons with volcanic power, granting Major Sorcery to nearby allies.
Tanlorin conjures a shield ofite volcanic rock, absorbing damage for themselves and nearby allies.
Tanlorin encases enemies inite stone, stunning them for an extended duration.
Tanlorin encases themselves in molten rock, limiting damage taken and dealing Flame Damage to nearby enemies.
Companion fires a powerful bow shot at a distant enemy, dealing Physical Damage.
Companion fires a volley of arrows at a target area, dealing Physical Damage over time.
Companion fires an arrow that knocks back the enemy and disorients them.
Companion fires an arrow coated in poison, dealing Poison Damage over time and interrupting enemies.
Companion unleashes a rapid barrage of arrows at the target, dealing Physical Damage with each hit.
Companion performs a powerful upward swing, dealing Physical Damage and knocking the enemy off balance.
Companion charges at an enemy, dealing Physical Damage and stunning them on impact.
Companion swings their weapon in a wide arc, dealing Physical Damage to all enemies in front and applying a bleed.
Companion builds momentum, gaining Major Brutality and healing over time.
Companion delivers a powerful execution strike that deals increased damage to low health enemies.
Companion thrusts their weapon at the enemy, dealing Physical Damage and applying a taunt.
unlock_requirements: Companion using One Hand and Shield

feature_description: Companion charges at an enemy with their shield, dealing Physical Damage and stunning them.
Companion slashes at an enemy's legs, dealing Physical Damage and applying Minor Maim.
Companion braces with their shield, reflecting the next spell projectile back at the attacker.
Companion raises their shield to block all incoming attacks, greatly reducing damage taken.
Companion unleashes an elemental blast based on their staff type, dealing Magic Damage with an elemental effect.
Companion creates a wall of elemental energy that deals Magic Damage over time to enemies within.
Companion focuses elemental energy into a powerful blast, dealing Magic Damage to a single target.
Companion exposes an enemy's weakness to elemental damage, applying Minor Breach.
Companion calls down an elemental storm that devastates enemies in a large area with Magic Damage.
Companion creates a circle of healing energy that restores Health to allies within over time.
Companion blesses an ally with regenerative energy, healing them over time.
Companion blesses allies in an area, healing them and granting Minor Resolve.
Companion conjures a protective ward that absorbs damage for an ally based on their missing Health.
Companion channels healing energy, restoring Health to nearby allies over time and granting Major Protection.
Companion gains increased Magicka Recovery and Spell Critical when wearing Light Armor pieces.
Companion gains reduced Magicka cost for abilities when wearing Light Armor.
Companion can activate a damage shield that absorbs spell damage based on Light Armor pieces worn.
Companion gains increased Stamina Recovery and Weapon Critical when wearing Medium Armor pieces.
Companion gains increased Weapon Damage when wearing Medium Armor.
Companion can activate increased dodge chance and movement speed based on Medium Armor pieces worn.
Companion gains increased Health and reduced damage taken when wearing Heavy Armor pieces.
Companion gains increased Health Recovery and block mitigation when wearing Heavy Armor.
Companion can activate crowd control immunity and increased armor based on Heavy Armor pieces worn.
Companion fires a Dawnguard bolt at an enemy, dealing Physical Damage. Deals bonus damage to Undead and Daedra.
Companion creates a rune on the ground that heals allies and applies Minor Protection.
Companion wields Meridia's sacred sword, dealing Physical Damage to enemies and additional damage to Undead.
Companion summons a ball of light that reveals stealthed enemies and grants Major Prophecy.
Companion places a fire rune on the ground that explodes when triggered, dealing Flame Damage.
Companion calls down a meteor from the sky, dealing massive Flame Damage in an area and stunning enemies.
Mirri's Dunmer heritage grants increased Flame Resistance and bonus damage with Flame abilities.
Bastian's Imperial heritage grants increased Health and bonus damage with sword abilities.
Ember's Khajiit heritage grants increased Stealth detection radius and bonus Critical Damage.
Isobel's Breton heritage grants increased Spell Resistance and bonus Magicka Recovery.
Sharp-as-Night's Argonian heritage grants increased Poison Resistance and bonus Healing Done.
Azandar's Redguard heritage grants increased Stamina and bonus Stamina Recovery.
Zerith-var's unique heritage grants increased Spell Damage and bonus damage with Necromancer abilities.
Tanlorin's Altmer heritage grants increased Magicka and bonus damage with Flame abilities.
